name: International Skoda Racin'n'Bashin II
overview: International Skoda Racin'n'Bashin II is the sequel to the original game. Like the original, it is an attempt to make a "Spy Hunter" like game on the Commodore 64 using the Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit (SEUCK) Just like the original, it was developed by Richard Bayliss. The sequel does feature improved graphics over the original game. It was published by Binary Zone PD in 1997.
